ade7c2bc9ccf09d843ccb3dfa56c1453a9e87318.commitMessage: YARN-4232. TopCLI console support for HA mode. Contributed by Bibin A Chundatt
ade7c2bc9ccf09d843ccb3dfa56c1453a9e87318.diff:
@@ -0,0 +1,9 @@
+  public URL getHAClusterUrl(Configuration conf, String rmhid)
+      throws MalformedURLException {
+    return new URL(WebAppUtils.getHttpSchemePrefix(conf)
+        + WebAppUtils.getResolvedRemoteRMWebAppURLWithoutScheme(conf,
+            YarnConfiguration.useHttps(conf) ? Policy.HTTPS_ONLY
+                : Policy.HTTP_ONLY,
+            rmhid)
+        + CLUSTER_INFO_URL);
+  }
\ No newline at end of file
